00026 struct PaperSize {

00028       const char* name;

00031          : qtsize(s), name(n), w(wi), h(hi) {}
00032       };

00038 struct PageFormat {
00039       int size;         // index in paperSizes[]
00040       double evenLeftMargin;
00041       double evenRightMargin;
00042       double evenTopMargin;
00043       double evenBottomMargin;
00044       double oddLeftMargin;

00047       double oddBottomMargin;
00048       bool landscape;
00049       bool twosided;
00050 
00051    public:

00054       double height() const;
00055       const char* name() const;

00057       void write(Xml&);
00058       };

00060 //---------------------------------------------------------
00061 //   Page
00062 //---------------------------------------------------------
00063 
00064 class Page : public Element {
00065       SystemList* _systems;
00066       int _no;                            // page number
00067       SText* pageNo;
00068       SText* copyright;
00069       ElementList _elements;
00070 
00071    public:
00072       Page(Score*, int);
00073       ~Page();
00074       Page(const Page& p) : Element(p)   {}   // dummy
00075       virtual Element* clone() const     { return 0; }
00076 
00077       SystemList* systems() const        { return _systems;   }
00078       void appendSystem(System* s);
00079       double addMeasure(Measure*, double);
00080 
00081       int no() const                     { return _no;        }
00082       void setNo(int n)                  { _no = n;           }
00083       bool isOdd() const                 { return _no & 1;    }
00084 
00085       double tm() const;       // margins
00086       double bm() const;
00087       double lm() const;
00088       double rm() const;
00089 
00090       ElementList* pel()                 { return &_elements; }
00091       const ElementList* pel() const     { return &_elements;        }
00092       virtual void add(Element*);
00093       virtual void remove(Element* el);
00094 
00095       void drawBorder(Painter& p) const;
00096       void layout();
00097 
00098       virtual void draw(Painter&p) const;
00099       };
